What should a saboteur consider when selecting targets for sabotage?

A saboteur should consider the capacity of their own skills and the capacity of their instruments when selecting targets for sabotage. They should also prioritize damaging objects and materials known to be in use by the enemy or destined for early use by the enemy, giving preference to military objects if possible.

(c) The saboteur should never attack targets beyond his capacity or the capacity of his instruments.
